header.description: No header dataset required — this report has no scalar tokens.

rows.description: Each row represents one schema from app_schemas table, displaying its ID and name.

totals.description: No totals dataset required — this report has no aggregate calculations.

semantics: This report has no parameters. All schemas are included without filtering.
transformations: Direct column mapping from app_schemas table — no reshaping, pivoting, or computed columns needed.
